alert.note: Alert for Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Sampson County through 615 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of Dunn, or 15 miles north of Clinton, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newton Grove and Hobbton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Some cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
